text:
❗️ CAUTION AGAINST SELF-MEDICATION OF CHLOROQUINE TO TREAT COVID-19 (read full thread 👇)

There are media reports of cases of severe poisoning and fatalities after people have self-experimented with #chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine to treat #COVID19. 

1/4

#PatientSafety https://t.co/UA8LU2paGQ
